page.title: 06Seine-net boats,Fraserburgh
page.content: My father is fisherman on a purse net boat.He catches{mackrel}or{herring (depending the time of year). They stop fishing at the start of summer for about one or two months to repaint or repair the boat. After this break they go to the{herring fisheries}and they have to change their nets for this.When they are at sea they search for shoals of herring in the fishing grounds and once they have found the herring they first of all shoot a bow called the{"dan".}Then they shoot the whole net going round in a circle. Then they pull both ends together to form a large bag and put a{pump}in the net to pump the fish into the tanks. they chill the water to make the fish stay fresh longer. { WILLIAM DICKSON}(13) ________________________
